info.name: Tumblr - Add Link the link button
info.description: Replaces the boring "Link" post icon with a GIF of Link from Legend of Zelda, moving the link icon out of the way and then standing in it's place. Inspired by a GIF posted on Tumblr by http://m4ster-shortpants.tumblr.com/
info.additionalInfo:
Works in Firefox (with Stylish) and Chrome (as a user script).
If Tumblr see this and want me to remove it I will. Contact me at ed_adams@live.com
